issue.title: [C++] Implement kernel to extract datetime components (year, month, day, etc) from date type objects
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13138](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13138). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ARROW-11759 implemented extraction of datetime components for timestamp objects; please can we have the equivalent extraction functions implemented for date objects too?

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13138?focusedCommentId=17407581) by Percy Camilo Triveño Aucahuasi (aucahuasi):*

I closed my duplicated ticket https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13788
